Name: Mindbytes: Learn to Read Japanese
About the game: Mindbytes: Learn to read Japanese is the most fun way to learn the Japanese writing systems of Katakana and Hiragana. • Learn each character of both Katakana and Hiragana including its name and pronunciation • Click the characters to learn how they are pronounced • Think fast and challenge yourself to reach the highest score in the fast-paced and fun game mode • Clicking the correct character earns you time, but getting the wrong answer causes a time penalty • Get as many correct answers as possible before time runs out • Reference flash-cards to look up any characters you haven't memorised yet • Improve your language skills while learning two new writing systems
